channel.title: Changes arent bieng made?
channel.description: When i change the price of an item in my shop or change the name of the welcome screen in client.java and i try to save it and compile it, it doesnt work i restart the server and when i log in and check everything that i changed nothing is changed. my compiler is sayin that it works though cuz it says "FINISHED !" soo does it mean i have a junk compiler ??.

item.title: Changes arent bieng made?
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

ohh ok thanks :). i appreciate it ;D !!!. now i know how to remove that stupid shop finally lol

Read full topic

item.title: Changes arent bieng made?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

smerf45:

hmm okay i figured it out but now im trying to totally delete a shop and i deleted everything for that for that shop in “NPC Handler.java” and also everythng in “Shops.CFG” an the lady is still there saying “barrows shop” any idea why shes not gone lol ?? ive also compiled and restarted my server and she’s still there ??

You have to remove her from autospawn.cfg.

Also, here is a tip: You don’t have to compile after editing a configuration file. You can simply just turn the server off and on. You only have to compile after editing java files.

Read full topic

item.title: Changes arent bieng made?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

No, you have 0 errors.
Compiler are not junk, they can’t be.
You are post to change that stuff in shops.cfg.
Try that:)
If that doesn’t work than something is wrong.
Nothing about shops expect making them tradeable, or what they use to buy stuff from you/sell are in client.java, everything else is in shops.cfg.

Read full topic
